title: There Is Absolutely NO REASON To Be Punished Over This Chat Log (The FULL Log).
body:
The community ignored the evidence that suggests I was 0% toxic that game:

1. **We can win this team.** (If I was "toxic", why would I say this to a team that is flaming me?).

2. **Now I'm so behind.** (If I was "toxic", why would I focus on myself being behind, instead of flaming my team?).

3. **I hope I can scale.** (If I was "toxic", why would I have hope to get back into the game, instead of verbally attacking my team?).

4. **"Look. I am trying to win this game too. So chill guys"** (If I was "toxic", why would I still be trying to reason with my team after it all?).

5. **These guys get angry too easy, they couldn't babysit ice cubes.** (If I was "toxic", why would I be making an obvious joke to lighten the mood?).

6. **Welcome back.** (If I was "toxic", why would I be welcoming back a flamer after they disconnected from the game?).

7. **So let's win this.** (If I was "toxic", why would I be positively motivating my team after being flamed all game?).

8. ** I'll vote yes.** (If I was "toxic" and "flaming" why did I vote "yes", instead of holding them hostage and watching them suffer?).

_**I am an exception case that has been terribly misconceived by a community that does not know the difference between using "kid" passive-aggressively, and using "kid" in its purest and non-insulting definitive manner.**_

----

This is what you guys are scapegoating, just this **5%** of my chat log:

Daddy Space Lion: Guys.
Daddy Space Lion: How do you build Ryze?
Daddy Space Lion: Damn.
Daddy Space Lion: Where were you guys?
Daddy Space Lion: I had his blue buff.
Daddy Space Lion: **What? Nah, the real trolls are my team.**
Daddy Space Lion: They think having bad games is always "inting".
Daddy Space Lion: **Let's all just be honest, kids are bad at understanding situations.**
Daddy Space Lion: **Report their**
Daddy Space Lion: Now they are distracting me, lol.
Daddy Space Lion: I had his blue buff, what did bot lane do? LMFAO. **They sit there, then blame me. Typical kids.**

_Calling a troll a troll is not against the rules (no matter how much you want to scapegoat it).
Calling a group of kids typical kids is not against the rules (no matter how much you want to scapegoat it)._
Writing a "report" joke with "their", not "them" that I never finished is not against the rules.
The word "typical" is not an insult, it refers to distinctive qualities, that is its definition!

-----

This is what you guys are ignoring, this is **95%** of my chat log that proves that I was in a POSITIVE mood, I was 0% toxic to the end.

Daddy Space Lion: You shut him down.
Daddy Space Lion: THANK YOU.
Daddy Space Lion: My emote.
Daddy Space Lion: Matches your akali skin.
Daddy Space Lion: It was destined.
Daddy Space Lion: Evelynn taking me jungle :<
Daddy Space Lion: I HAD it.
Daddy Space Lion: Bot lane left me to die.
Daddy Space Lion: What.
Daddy Space Lion: I said I was jungle in queue.
Daddy Space Lion: Did you not see?
Daddy Space Lion: **Now I'm so behind.**
Daddy Space Lion: **I hope I can scale.**
Daddy Space Lion: At least jungle camps spawn faster.
Daddy Space Lion: Well played.
Daddy Space Lion: Ganking bot,
Daddy Space Lion: Guys.
Daddy Space Lion: What are you doing.
Daddy Space Lion: What was that.
Daddy Space Lion: You took my jungle, and bot lane left me to die.
Daddy Space Lion: How is my fault?
Daddy Space Lion: Is that the new champion?
Daddy Space Lion: What is that.
Daddy Space Lion: He's OP.
Daddy Space Lion: He needs nerfs.
Daddy Space Lion: The person always playing broken OP champions always say they aren't, lmfao.
Daddy Space Lion: At least I admit Ryze is broken OP.
Daddy Space Lion: Evelynn.
Daddy Space Lion: You have right jungle.,
Daddy Space Lion: I have left jungle.
Daddy Space Lion: GOOD JOB.
Daddy Space Lion: **We can win this team.**
Daddy Space Lion: Damn it.
Daddy Space Lion: I'm not inting.
Daddy Space Lion: It's not intentional at all.
Daddy Space Lion: I'm actually trying.
Daddy Space Lion: I got trolled by Evelynn and bot lane :<
Daddy Space Lion: If you came and helped me.
Daddy Space Lion: You'd have first blood bro.
Daddy Space Lion: What? Bruh.
Daddy Space Lion: He had no HP.
Daddy Space Lion: Yes.
Daddy Space Lion: And they all used their cooldowns on me.
Daddy Space Lion: **Look.**
Daddy Space Lion: **I'm trying to win this game too.**
Daddy Space Lion: **So chill guys.**
Daddy Space Lion: Ryze feels weaker.
Daddy Space Lion: Maybe his nerfs actually made him worse.
Daddy Space Lion: Guys, don't play Ryze. His nerfs have gutted him.
Daddy Space Lion: I ping team to help me, they leave me to die
Daddy Space Lion: Then they get mad at me, and say mean things, and I'm like "chill guys".
Daddy Space Lion: **These guys get angry too easy, they couldn't babysit ice cubes** (I was joking to lighten the mood.)
Daddy Space Lion: **Welcome back**.
Daddy Space Lion: Thought we lost you there.
Daddy Space Lion: This is a team game.
Daddy Space Lion: **So let's win this.**
Daddy Space Lion: No.
Daddy Space Lion: Watch.
Daddy Space Lion: **I'll vote yes.**
Daddy Space Lion: I'm not trolling.

**There is no "flaming" or "arguing", I was POSITIVE from beginning to end, why do you punish innocent people like me, and not the actual toxic players?** Read my numbered list from 1~8, I was not "toxic", I was not even "toxic" in the slightest, I was joking about Ryze, I was not at all angry or flaming, the community twisting my words and scapegoating does not change the inevitable Truth, **I am truly being falsely accused over people that don't realize I did NOT use "kid" in a passive-aggressive manner, I used it in an intellectual manner**, this is all a misunderstanding on the community's part and the system's part.

{{summoner:13}} The down votes are the result of a huge misunderstanding, I was 0% toxic, I broke 0 rules, and I have been flamed by a pre-made, then I came here to be unfairly torn apart by a very trigger happy community that refuse to listen to my points, and continue to attack me passive-aggressively, I am the victim here, why can't you see that the behavior of my pre-made and the community is hypocritical compared to my professionally written responses?

replies.body:
As this thread was the original one created by the OP, I'm going to unlock it.  However, be aware that all content must adhere to the [**Player Behavior Guidelines**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/OjEUxbwH-player-behavior-rules-update).  If this thread does not adhere to those guidelines, I will be locking it again.

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
Consistent harassment of other players. You don't get to dictate how they play. You don't own jungle camps. Yes, this is punishable.

> You conveniently ignore these points because you will say anything to defend this company as you are paid to, and we know people will do anything for money, even if that involves lying to our own people and hypocritically expecting the players of this game to meet community guidelines that you sweep under the rug. Your controlled responses are biased and compromised, you always ignore every point against this company, even when you are so clearly wrong and so blatantly deceiving these players with your serpent's tongue. Your actions are what is punishable, you are complicit in denying evidence and hiding evidence to protect the image of this company time after time again, and many of us have called you out on it.

Riot does not pay people to defend their company. Why are you being toxic over what he said? He just gave his opinion ,which isn't bad.

Chat logs breakdown:
> Daddy Space Lion: Let's all just be honest, kids are bad at understanding situations. 

This isn't true ,and your harassed them by calling them "kids"

> Daddy Space Lion: What? Nah, the real trolls are my team.

Calling your teammates trolls. Even if they are trolling retaliating isn't the way to go.

> Daddy Space Lion: Report their
> Daddy Space Lion: Now they are distracting me, lol.
> Daddy Space Lion: I had his blue buff, what did bot lane do? LMFAO. They sit there, then blame me. Typical kids.
> 

Still  harassing your teammates calling them "Typical kids".

> Daddy Space Lion: Evelynn taking me jungle :<
> 

The jungle isn't just for jungle. It's for everyone. Except it's friendly to ask the jungler kindly for the buff ,but 15-20 minutes it's anyones in my opinion. 

>Daddy Space Lion: I ping team to help me, they leave me to die

Your team isn't required to help you. Especially if could leave them to die. 

My suggestion to not get punished in the future? Don't type as much. Do /fullmute all if needed. Take breaks between games so you don't get tilted. Don't retaliate. Use chat to give constructive advice. Be friendly.

Have a good day.

> [{quoted}](name=XVI Jake IVX,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xuTaEHLP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-12-13T02:11:21.475+0000)
>
> Chat logs breakdown:
> 
> This isn't true ,and your harassed them by calling them "kids"
> 
> Calling your teammates trolls. Even if they are trolling retaliating isn't the way to go.
> 
> Still  harassing your teammates calling them "Typical kids".
> 
> The jungle isn't just for jungle. It's for everyone. Except it's friendly to ask the jungler kindly for the buff ,but 15-20 minutes it's anyones in my opinion. 
> 
> Your team isn't required to help you. Especially if could leave them to die. 
> 
> My suggestion to not get punished in the future? Don't type as much. Do /fullmute all if needed. Take breaks between games so you don't get tilted. Don't retaliate. Use chat to give constructive advice. Be friendly.
> 
> Have a good day.

Why else does the authority tell young people to stay out of specific areas where the authority strictly operates? It's because young people (kids / teens / young adults) do not have enough experience to understand situations, why do you think they always say we are "inting" when we are having a bad game, that supports are bad because of their KDA, their "reasoning" is reflected game after game, you saying that it is not true when this game is plagued by the opposite of what you said is disingenuous.

The player behavioral system was met for extreme cases, racial, death threats, constant flaming and being absolutely mean and unsympathetic to your team mates, if they are being trolls, calling them trolls is not a threat or against the rules, you are purposely reaching for disingenuous reasons to not give me back my honor that I have earned by playing games and being honorable in the first place, just as cordially as I am here on the forums. I speak the raw truth, precise and straight to the point, and I call everything out for exactly what it is, you are being disingenuous.

Kids are typically not capable of listening or understanding emotional situations, any field of psychology will vouch for me on this. Their brain's are young and situations in this world have much context that even young adults have not learned how to assess and assimilate. Calling them typical kids is exactly what they are, that's not harassing them, that's not threatening them, that's simply what it is, typical kids, that's what typical kids do,
do you not know what "typical" means? It refers to their distinctive qualities, this has nothing to do with harassing.

I never ordered them to help me, it's quite sad how much you guys are going to reach for straws to keep people punished, when they are clearly and inevitably not the ones that should have been punished, by looking at the smallest of things you can muster to create a baseless reason to say they deserved it, I simply explained why I died after they blamed me for something they could have prevented by listening to my pings, it's really that simple, you are just being disingenuous as I said.

You don't have to explain why you die.  You also don't know if there kids. So calling them kids, when x isn't immature in my opinion. Also were you explaining to why you die? To me it looks like that's in all chat ,but I can't tell.

>Daddy Space Lion: I had his blue buff, what did bot lane do? LMFAO. They sit there, then blame me. Typical kids.


In that context. That is toxic.

> [{quoted}](name=XVI Jake IVX,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xuTaEHLP,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2019-12-13T02:48:03.259+0000)
>
> You don't have to explain why you die.  You also don't know if there kids. So calling them kids, when x isn't immature in my opinion. Also were you explaining to why you die? To me it looks like that's in all chat ,but I can't tell.
> 
> 
> In that context. That is toxic.

Yes, I do. I always speak to my team mates. Your "mute all, and hope your team mates can work in unison to win the game" excuse in dealing with actual toxic players is a cop-out for your blatant incompetence in distinguishing the difference between extreme hate speech and flaming, and someone calling a troll "a troll", or a kid "a kid". This world has truly gone mad, people just don't use common sense anymore, and even the moderators have lost their minds, something is happening to this world on a global level, and you don't even know it is happening until it's too late, how can you be this daft? It's COMMON SENSE, but this company has clearly created a community that cannot even see what this company is doing to them in plain sight. This is EXACTLY what makes you a typical kid, your responses alone demonstrate how little you understand situations, and how absurd your responses are. You are actually trying to say I deserved the punishment, when there's NOTHING in that chat log that permits ANY punishment, the system is rigged as much as the client is damaged, this company is the problem, not my chat log, you need to open your eyes and stop spouting nonsense that is so easily explained with COMMON SENSE. They probably thought I was typing too much, but in my POST, I SAID "**I only typed when I could type, I did not type at any point where I could play the game, I only typed while my skills were on cool down, and I was WAITING for them to come back up to finish off the jungle monsters**". I confirmed that I WAS NOT typing too much, I just type really fast and can write huge paragraphs without any effort, **I got PUNISHED for having astute typing capabilities**! I ALWAYS TYPE FAST IN MY GAMES, AND GUESS WHAT? I WON THEM, AND CARRIED EVEN 4 V 5's WHILE TYPING A LOT -- BEING PUNISHED FOR HAVING TYPING SKILLS IS WHY I TICKED THE PUNISHMENT, MY CHAT LOG PROVES I BROKE ZERO RULES, I AM JUST A REALLY GOOD TYPER -- END OF STORY. Anyone's attempt to make a mountain out of a molehill out of my chat log is being disingenuous, it's really that simple. This is a MISTAKE on the system's part, I did NOTHING wrong.

> *Your "mute all, and hope your team mates can work in unison to win the game" excuse in dealing with actual toxic players is a cop-out for your blatant incompetence in distinguishing the difference between extreme hate speech and flaming, and someone calling a troll "a troll", or a kid "a kid".

I was giving advice. I said mute all if you get tilted by what your teammate says. I personally never mute all ,but I know it can help some players avoid punishments so I was just giving that advice out. No need to get salty. I'm just having a casual conversation with you ,but it seems like your getting salty.

> [{quoted}](name=XVI Jake IVX,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xuTaEHLP,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2019-12-13T03:07:30.277+0000)
>
> I was giving advice. I said mute all if you get tilted by what your teammate says. I personally never mute all ,but I know it can help some players avoid punishments so I was just giving that advice out. No need to get salty. I'm just having a casual conversation with you ,but it seems like your getting salty.

Your advice isn't advice, it's vice, it's poison, it's not wisdom, you have no idea what you are arguing against. Nothing in that chat log is against the rules, the REAL reason why I got punished is the same reason "OneMust Fall" stated, he thinks I was typing "too much", but this is an ignorant judgement, I don't "type too much" -- I "type too fast", you have no idea how many games people comment about how fast I type, I'm just naturally gifted with typing words and using words, it's in my nature, I got punished because who ever saw my "report" thought I typed too much like "OneMustFall", but in reality I type like that in ALL MY GAMES, and I WIN many of them as the carry. They constantly tell me to write a book or a novel, constantly, I have earned HONOR for my EFFORT, in those games that I "TYPED A LOT" in, why are you guys this daft? The chat log has ZERO rule breaking, if you don't have the discernment to see that they IGNORANTLY punished me for my "typing" thinking I "typed too much as a detriment to the game", which is evident by how "OneMustFall" responded, whom are completely ignorant of someone that CAN type as fast as I can, then DON'T RESPOND, you do not have the acuity to understand the situation at its fullest extent, that being I was FALSELY punished, I LOST my HONOR that I EARNED for my months of GOOD BEHAVIOR, and this system being FAULTY, and people like you refusing to ADMIT TO ITS FAULTS.

> [{quoted}](name=IBrokeUrGfsNexus,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xuTaEHLP,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-12-13T03:14:51.613+0000)
>
> Your advice isn't advice, it's vice, it's poison, it's not wisdom, you have no idea what you are arguing against. Nothing in that chat log is against the rules, the REAL reason why I got punished is the same reason "OneMust Fall" stated, he thinks I was typing "too much", but this is an ignorant judgement, I don't "type too much" -- I "type too fast", you have no idea how many games people comment about how fast I type, I'm just naturally gifted with typing words and using words, it's in my nature, I got punished because who ever saw my "report" thought I typed too much like "OneMustFall", but in reality I type like that in ALL MY GAMES, and I WIN many of them as the carry. They constantly tell me to write a book or a novel, constantly, I have earned HONOR for my EFFORT, in those games that I "TYPED A LOT" in, why are you guys this daft? The chat log has ZERO rule breaking, if you don't have the discernment to see that they IGNORANTLY punished me for my "typing" thinking I "typed too much as a detriment to the game", which is evident by how "OneMustFall" responded, whom are completely ignorant of someone that CAN type as fast as I can, then DON'T RESPOND, you do not have the acuity to understand the situation at its fullest extent, that being I was FALSELY punished, I LOST my HONOR that I EARNED for my months of GOOD BEHAVIOR, and this system being FAULTY, and people like you refusing to ADMIT TO ITS FAULTS.

You rang?

It looks like repeatedly insisting that your behavior was fine and that everyone disagreeing with you is a jerk/heretic isn't convincing anyone.

Given that LoL's rules are basically framed around the fundamental concept of "don't behave in a way that would bother most people" and most people who have voted and commented here are indicating that your behavior would bother us, I don't think it's that far-fetched for you to reconsider your position and entertain the notion that your behavior broke LoL's rules and did merit a punishment.

Lol the way you use kids IS the condescending passive aggressive way dude. If you didnt mean to be condescending, you gotta learn to communicate better, because you did use it in the condescending way. Also called for reports, also called them trolls. Sorry dude, thats against the rules. Doesnt make you a bad person or anything. Just means you broke certain rules of chat in an online video game and got punished in said video game. No biggy. At least you learned.more about the rules from it and come out wiser.

 If you just disagree with Riots rules, thats another thing and I can understand that. But you need to know that referring to anonymous strangers as "kids" while calling them trolls and criticizing their understanding of situations (especially when them being a "kid" IS your reason for their bad understanding skills), IS THE condescending way to use the term. Should it be against the rules? Well thats a matter of opinion, and I have nothing against that if you think it shouldnt be.

> [{quoted}](name=Tele II,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xuTaEHLP,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-12-13T23:08:23.027+0000)
>
> Lol the way you use kids IS the condescending passive aggressive way dude. If you didnt mean to be condescending, you gotta learn to communicate better, because you did use it in the condescending way. Also called for reports, also called them trolls. Sorry dude, thats against the rules. Doesnt make you a bad person or anything. Just means you broke certain rules of chat in an online video game and got punished in said video game. No biggy. At least you learned.more about the rules from it and come out wiser.
> 
>  If you just disagree with Riots rules, thats another thing and I can understand that. But you need to know that referring to anonymous strangers as "kids" while calling them trolls and criticizing their understanding of situations (especially when them being a "kid" IS your reason for their bad understanding skills), IS THE condescending way to use the term. Should it be against the rules? Well thats a matter of opinion, and I have nothing against that if you think it shouldnt be.

You did not read my chat log with a genuine intention then, because A. I did not call for a report, I said "their", not "them", I was going to make a report joke that was not directed at them, B. you are cherry-picking, this is what this entire community seems to be doing, cherry-picking, despite 95% of my chat log contradicts your assertions, C. when I said "typical kids", I was just mentioning they were typical kids, that's it, nothing insulting about it, they are kids, that's what they are, kids do not understand situations, kids play this game, you asserting that is an insult is a disingenuous scapegoat, and **95% of my chat log again proves my innocence**, if you would stop cherry-picking 5% of my chat log, then read the 95% of my chat log, which shows I was 0% "toxic" throughout the game, then the 5% you are cherry-picking will then become 100% innocent, it was the pre-made flaming me, and this community flaming me. 

This community is hypocritical and really should not be in player behavior until it practices what it preaches, the people responding with holier than thou speeches are passive-aggressively attacking us and the moderators do nothing about it, _**the corruption of justice in this community needs to be addressed before anymore innocent people are falsely down voted and hounded by the community that is nothing more than a network of hypocrisy defending each other in a kangaroo court echo chamber.**_

> [{quoted}](name=IBrokeUrGfsNexus,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xuTaEHLP,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2019-12-13T23:32:56.117+0000)
>
> You did not read my chat log with a genuine intention then, because A. I did not call for a report, I said "their", not "them", I was going to make a report joke that was not directed at them, B. you are cherry-picking, this is what this entire community seems to be doing, cherry-picking, despite 95% of my chat log contradicts your assertions, C. when I said "typical kids", I was just mentioning they were typical kids, that's it, nothing insulting about it, they are kids, that's what they are, kids do not understand situations, kids play this game, you asserting that is an insult is a disingenuous scapegoat, and **95% of my chat log again proves my innocence**, if you would stop cherry-picking 5% of my chat log, then read the 95% of my chat log, which shows I was 0% "toxic" throughout the game, then the 5% you are cherry-picking will then become 100% innocent, it was the pre-made flaming me, and this community flaming me. 
> 
> This community is hypocritical and really should not be in player behavior until it practices what it preaches, the people responding with holier than thou speeches are passive-aggressively attacking us and the moderators do nothing about it, _**the corruption of justice in this community needs to be addressed before anymore innocent people are falsely down voted and hounded by the community that is nothing more than a network of hypocrisy defending each other in a kangaroo court echo chamber.**_

The thing about the rules is, it doesnt give you a pass on breaking rules because you were trying to win and being nice in 95% of your chat. I think maybe you just misunderstood the punishment system. You can be the nicest guy in the world 99% of the time. But if you break the rules, you break the rules. You still get a punishment. That 99% doesnt make you free of punishment, you know? And its an echo chamber because we are addressing your points. We cant all say different shit because that would be off topic. We're all addrssing the same issue, of course its gonna sound like an echo chamber. 

About the kid thing, I didnt see you ask anyones age. Im 33 and I play this game. They may not be kids, so that point that "they are kids, kids play this game" is moot. You dont know that they are kids. To tell an anonymous stranger that they dont understand the situation because theyre a kid, is clearly insulting. You must really think people are stupid if you think we're gonna buy that shit. You used that specific language BECAUSE its condescending. Stop trying to play so innocent about it. We all do it sometimes. Its really fucking obvious, especially considering they were flaming you, so stop insulting my intelligence trying to act like it was completely neutral. 

Keep in mind, I've never said anything about you being a jerk or anything. I even said it doesnt make you a bad person. Breaking Riots rules that exist ONLY in the vacuum of this game, does not reflect your character as a person. They are not a moral code to live by, or some kind of life lesson. Im just trying to help you understand the punishment system. 

Also, cherry picking the parts that broke the rules is the only way to help you understand why you got punished. I dont know wtf you want. Should I comment on every single line? What do you expect? 

P.S. I've had comments on the boards here removed for condescending. If you report those condescending to you, their comments will get removed. The moderators cant stop people from condescending to you ahead of time, but they will remove it after the fact if that helps :/ I do agree that a lot of people here do get the purpose of these threads wrong. They think its an opportunity to judge someone as a person and virtue signal to them. Its disgusting. Like I said, Riots rules are not a moral code, and I dont take someone getting punished as some sort of indicator of their moral stature. People here should help others understand the system, not shame them for breaking the rules. Thats the whole point of this section... as well as to discuss opinions on the rules/player behavior.

> [{quoted}](name=Tele II,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xuTaEHLP,comment-id=000600000001,timestamp=2019-12-14T04:04:34.181+0000)
>
> The thing about the rules is, it doesnt give you a pass on breaking rules because you were trying to win and being nice in 95% of your chat. I think maybe you just misunderstood the punishment system. You can be the nicest guy in the world 99% of the time. But if you break the rules, you break the rules. You still get a punishment. That 99% doesnt make you free of punishment, you know? And its an echo chamber because we are addressing your points. We cant all say different shit because that would be off topic. We're all addrssing the same issue, of course its gonna sound like an echo chamber. 
> 
> About the kid thing, I didnt see you ask anyones age. Im 33 and I play this game. They may not be kids, so that point that "they are kids, kids play this game" is moot. You dont know that they are kids. To tell an anonymous stranger that they dont understand the situation because theyre a kid, is clearly insulting. You must really think people are stupid if you think we're gonna buy that shit. You used that specific language BECAUSE its condescending. Stop trying to play so innocent about it. We all do it sometimes. Its really fucking obvious, especially considering they were flaming you, so stop insulting my intelligence trying to act like it was completely neutral. 
> 
> Keep in mind, I've never said anything about you being a jerk or anything. I even said it doesnt make you a bad person. Breaking Riots rules that exist ONLY in the vacuum of this game, does not reflect your character as a person. They are not a moral code to live by, or some kind of life lesson. Im just trying to help you understand the punishment system. 
> 
> Also, cherry picking the parts that broke the rules is the only way to help you understand why you got punished. I dont know wtf you want. Should I comment on every single line? What do you expect?

You are completely missing the point, the point is calling people a kid in the way that I did (not passive-aggressively) is NOT against the rules -- PERIOD, anyone making up a sob story about it is scapegoating, which is not contributing to this thread at all. The point I am making about the 95% of my chat log is that if I was not "toxic" through 95% of my chat log, and you are cherry-picking 5% of my chat log by twisting the rules with your subjective feelings (which have NO place in player behavior), then CLEARLY the 5% you guys are cherry-picking is irrelevant, and your attempts to condemn me is disingenuous -- PERIOD. I Broke ZERO Rules, that's the WHOLE POINT. You cannot punish me for using "kid" the way I did, because it's not insulting or breaking any rules -- **YOU being disingenuous and twisting my words to fit your misguided narratives is IRRELEVANT, I did NOT use "kid" passive-aggressively, you saying I did is simply a careless lie.** You are cherry-picking, that alone proves that you are not here for any professional reason, and your "responses" are misguided at best.
